amendment.description: To establish limitations regarding Confucius Institutes, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1991 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1991 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4192) To establish limitations regarding Confucius Institutes, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1991 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1991 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 2301.
